title: Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve
title_original: Unilexi Womens Loose Long Sleeve Rainbow Striped Cardigans Sweater Boho Color Block Chunky Knitted Tops

specs.Best Sellers Rank: #212,630 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ( See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ) #1,398 in Women's Cardigans

category: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry > Women > Clothing > Sweaters > Cardigans

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan to be a quality piece with a generous one-size-fits-all design that provides plenty of room. They love the color and find it super soft and comfortable. The thickness receives mixed feedback, with several customers noting the material is super thick. The sleeve quality receives negative feedback, with one customer reporting issues with stitching coming undone.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feel like a jacket but it’s the most stylish cardigan this season.
items.body: Love the colors and style. Gives me hip kimono vibes. Made well, soft fabulous knit. Has a stretchy quality that makes it keep its shape. Generous one size fits all. Covers butt. Read more
items.author: Patrice Frazier

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thick, great quality and love the bright colors.
items.body: Thick, great quality and love the bright colors. Read more
items.author: Jeremy P.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars She Loved It
items.body: I bought this for my mother-in-love for Christmas. She absolutely loved it. Great quality Read more
items.author: Auberney

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Vibrant colors
items.body: I love the colors. It runs big. Read more
items.author: Chinitha D

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Oouuwwee!!
items.body: I love this cardigan! It's so comfy and warm! I bought it in my true size and has been washed with no shedding! Read more
items.author: Kendall Pearlene

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect
items.body: Sometimes it can be very hard to buy plus size clothing on Amazon. I usually get clothes from Torrid because I know it will fit. It’s always a risk to buy clothes online. More times than not I have to return it and I am always disappointed that the item was smaller than described. Not this cardigan. It’s very true to size and roomy. Vibrant colors. Soft. Super cute. I would recommend buying this if your on the fence. I am very happy with my purchase. Read more
items.author: jessica

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I was complemented left and right about my sweater
items.body: Very nice quality absolutely satisfied with my purchase Read more
items.author: Linneth walker

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Poor Quality
items.body: Pocket stitching coming undone. Looks like better quality than it is. Read more
items.author: Colleen Arcuri

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Pink, Orange. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
